meanings.definition: The branch of science concerned with the nature and properties of matter and energy.
meanings.sent1: Studying physics helps us understand how things work in the world.
meanings.sent2: In physics class, we learn about forces and motion.
meanings.sent3: The physics of a bouncing ball can be quite entertaining to observe.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of physics equations, swirling and colliding.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of physics lies in its ability to explain the mysteries of the universe.

meanings.definition: The physical properties and phenomena of something.
meanings.sent1: The physics of the new material make it ideal for construction.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the physics of light helps in designing optical devices.
meanings.sent3: The physics of a balloon floating in the air can be fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent4: The physics of a rollercoaster ride can be both thrilling and scary.
meanings.sent5: The physics of a rainbow reveals the magic of light and water droplets.
